name: VM Audio SRHP3 Stereo MP3/iPhone iPod Over Head On Ear DJ Headphones Lime/White

reviews.name: VM Audio SRHP3 Stereo MP3/iPhone iPod Over Head On Ear DJ Headphones Lime/White
reviews.reviewText: Price was unbelievable and they work great! My son loves them, very happy with this purchase and no shipping made it even nicer!
reviews.title: Awesome..

reviews.name: VM Audio SRHP3 Stereo MP3/iPhone iPod Over Head On Ear DJ Headphones Lime/White
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my son. He's 10 so didn't want to empty my wallet...but it's really nice for the price..and he will love the lime green color!
reviews.title: Awesomeness!

reviews.name: VM Audio SRHP3 Stereo MP3/iPhone iPod Over Head On Ear DJ Headphones Lime/White
reviews.reviewText: for the price this is one hot number! Excellent sound!
reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.name: VM Audio SRHP3 Stereo MP3/iPhone iPod Over Head On Ear DJ Headphones Lime/White
reviews.title: headphones rock

reviews.name: VM Audio SRHP3 Stereo MP3/iPhone iPod Over Head On Ear DJ Headphones Lime/White
reviews.reviewText:
I didn't buy these to be blown away by the sound quality. But I am blown away by how good they sound for such a low price!
About the only knock I can give them is that they are lime green, and the same headphones in the blue color I wanted were 2 dollars more. lol
reviews.title: Great headphones for a great price.
